info.name: Multi-Product Learning API
info.description: Complete API test collection for the Multi-Product Learning Platform with JWT authentication, role-based access control, and comprehensive admin endpoints. Updated with all recent features including password management, quiz attempts history, single item details, and user management.

request.description: Request a password reset token. In production, this would be sent via email.
Reset password using the token from forgot-password endpoint
Change password for the authenticated user. Requires current password.
Get quiz attempt history with optional filtering by product, topic, and correctness

item.name: Get Quiz Attempts for Specific Quiz

request.description: Get all attempts for a specific quiz with statistics
Get all products the authenticated user has access to. Admins get all products.
Get single Q&A with bookmark status
Get single quiz details. Correct answer is hidden until user has attempted the quiz.
Get single PDF with bookmark status
List all users with pagination and optional role filtering
Get detailed user information including products and statistics
Change a user's role (USER, ADMIN, MASTER_ADMIN)
Delete a user (cannot delete yourself)
Get all products assigned to a specific user
Get single product with topics and counts
Get single topic with product info and content counts
Get single Q&A with topic and product info

body.raw:
{
  "topicId": "{{topicId}}",
  "question": "What is a binary tree?",
  "answer": "A binary tree is a tree data structure where each node has at most two children.",
  "level": "BEGINNER",
  "companyTags": ["Amazon", "Google", "Microsoft"]
}

request.description: Get single quiz with topic, product info and attempt counts

body.raw:
{
  "topicId": "{{topicId}}",
  "question": "What is the time complexity of binary search?",
  "options": ["O(n)", "O(log n)", "O(n^2)", "O(1)"],
  "correctAnswer": "O(log n)",
  "explanation": "Binary search divides the search space in half each iteration.",
  "level": "INTERMEDIATE",
  "companyTags": ["Amazon", "Facebook"]
}

request.description: Get single PDF with topic and product info

body.raw:
{
  "topicId": "{{topicId}}",
  "title": "Data Structures Cheat Sheet",
  "description": "Complete reference for all data structures",
  "fileUrl": "https://example.com/pdfs/ds-cheatsheet.pdf",
  "fileSize": 2048000
}

request.description: Get comprehensive platform analytics including user counts, quiz statistics, and recent activity
